itemInfo.itemDesc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff

item.name: Pure Platinum Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Platinum Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Maple Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Maple Trees with a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Maple Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Seclusion, Castle Ruins, Bloody Monastery, Northern Plain of Serendia, and Mediah Northern Highlands. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Maple Trees.

item.name: Monk's Branch
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Monk's Branch requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Trace of Battle
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Bernianto Farm.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Bares Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Grade 1 Weapon Reform Stone
item.desc: A material used in 1st-grade weapon upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Bares Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for all living things.

item.name: Bares Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff

item.name: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame, Bares Staff

item.name: Ultimate Bares Staff
item.desc:
A Bares staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Bares staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Bares Staff of Crimson Flame, Bares Staff of Destruction, Bares Staff of Temptation, Bares Staff

item.name: Bares Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Bares Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Bares Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Bares Staff of Temptation, Bares Staff
